member.summary: Functions for workflow macro methods.

member.name: M:CMS.WorkflowEngine.Web.UI.WorkflowTransformationFunctions.PassedThroughActions(System.Object,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns true if document had passed through one/all selected workflow actions.
member.param: Workflow action names separated with a semicolon
If true all actions must have been passed.

member.name: M:CMS.WorkflowEngine.Web.UI.WorkflowTransformationFunctions.PassedThroughSteps(System.Object,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns true if document had passed through one/all specified workflow steps.
member.param: Workflow step names separated with a semicolon
If true all specified steps must have been passed.

member.summary: Registers javascript code capable of displaying contact data and journey in designer.
member.param: Page object used to register javascript code.
Graph identifier used to access javascript object.
Contact identifier to register correct contact detail url.
Step identifier in which the contact is currently.
Indicates whether contact data is rendered.
Collection of step identifiers which led to current step.
